        public java.sql.CallableStatement getCallStatement(java.lang.String query)

      • getComboBoxModel

        public javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel getComboBoxModel(int x)
        Returns comboBoxModel of given comboBox. The codes are as follows:
        Codes for comboBox models
        code comboBox
        0 shop
        1 genre
        2 type
        3 dewey level 1
        4 roles
        5 series
        6 authors
        Parameters:
        x - int indicating which model to get
        Returns:
        comboBoxModel containing required names

      • getDewey2Model

        public javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel getDewey2Model(int dew1,
                                                       java.lang.Object first)
        Returns a comboBox model for the level 2 Dewey comboBox
        Parameters:
        dew1 - Dewey number level 1 selected (000, 100, 200 ...)
        first - Selected level 1 topic, to be first element in dewey2 comboBox
        Returns:
        DefaultComboBoxMOdel containing tens (010, 020, 030....)

      • getDewey3Model

        public javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel getDewey3Model(int dew2,
                                                       java.lang.Object first)
        Returns comboBoxModel for Dewey level 3 comboBox model, given level 2 selected
        Parameters:
        dew2 - Dewey number level 2 selected
        first - Selected level 2 topic, to be first element in dewey3 comboBox
        Returns:
        DefaultComboBoxModel containing units (001, 002, 003..)
